Title: Oluwo hails Awujale’s Islamic burial as victory for Yoruba dignity
Summary: Oluwo of Iwo hails Islamic burial as victory for Yoruba dignity . Oba Sikiru Kayode Adetona was the late Awujale of Ijebuland . He described the Islamic burial rites as a new standard for honouring Yoruba monarchs .

Title: Fidau prayer for Buhari holds Wednesday
Summary: The third-day Fidau Prayer for former President Muhammadu Buhari is to be held this morning in Daura, Katsina State . The prayer is a time for friends and relations to gather and pray .

Title: Nasarawa PDP denies endorsing candidate for 2027
Summary: Nasarawa State Chairman of the PDP has refuted claims of bias or clandestine support for any gubernatorial aspirant . Hon. Adamu Bako Ningha described allegations as baseless and lacking in truth .

Title: Court orders final forfeiture of N335m, hospital, five filling stations to FG
Summary: Court orders final forfeiture of N335m, hospital, five filling stations to the Federal Government . The Federal High Court in Abuja has ordered a final forfeiture . The court ordered the forfeiture of several assets, including N335 million, a hospital, among others, to the Government .

Summary: The Nigeria Immigration Service (NIS) will inaugurate a new digital platform for the application of the Combined Expatriate Residence Permit and Aliens Card (CERPAC) on August 1 . NIS inaugurates digital expatriate residence permit platform .
